subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jack Zduriencik, known for shrewd scouting and drafting, is inheriting the first team in major league history with a $100 million payroll to lose 100 games
snippet: Jack Zduriencik, known for shrewd scouting and drafting, is inheriting the first team in major league history with a $100 million payroll to lose 100 games
